EmailTemplate.subject: Great news! Our current deadline has been extended to 1 February 2015!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org. ALUMNI 2015 - FAST TRACK YOUR APPLICATION!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Great news! Our current deadline has been extended to 1 February 2015!
Returner Benefits!
Get your application into us by the 1 February and as a returner benefit from:
Our new online application form - most of the work is already done for you! Be the first to be allocated to a role - the choice will be yours! Use our new online booking system - making it easier to book onto the training of your choice. Special returner training days - no more full training if you have done the role before.
Click here to continue your application! https://staffing.the-challenge.org
We are really looking forward to having you back to work with us again this year. Get your application to us and we will fast track you through our process!
Looking forward to catching up with you very soon.
Best wishes,
The Challenge NCS Programme seasonal-roles@the-challenge.org CA 1.9e VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
